title: roasted chicken with tarragon, Madeira and mash
description: An easy chicken stew is just the thing to have up your sleeve for surprise guests. Wild mushrooms and truffles make it special.
ingredients: 1 garlic bulb, cut in half horizontally
500g/1lb 2oz mixed wild mushrooms (such as chanterelles, girolles, ceps, and morels), cleaned
300g/11oz King Edward potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
